The players of both teams deserve praise from their managers and supporters for their performance on the pitch. If they continue playing this attractive football, the fans will surely be satisfied. The visitors were more active and dominated the home side in the first half, who weren't able to keep up. The home side is creating their opportunities using lightning fast counter attacks. The tactic of the away side is slow build up play.

Quick reactions by Lionel Messi (Barcelona) and Neymar, tricking their opponents with a cheeky chip pass. A beautiful football moment and great skill, which caused the noise in the stadium to go up a notch.
